alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:20AM CST until January 28 at 2:24PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River Near East Bernard affecting Colorado, Wharton, Fort Bend and Austin Counties. San Bernard River near Boling affecting Wharton, Fort Bend and Brazoria Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River near Sweeny affecting Brazoria County. For the San Bernard River...including East Bernard, Sweeny, Boling... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Bernard River near East Bernard. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage with minor roads along the river inundated. Backwater flooding up Britt Branch and Bratcher Slough begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Thursday was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.4 feet on 12/10/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun San Bernard River East Bernard 17.0 17.2 Thu 10 am CS 18.3 18.0 16.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening.late tonight at 430 AM CST.
